# subscriptionIDsToDelete

**Instance Property**

The IDs of the subscriptions that you want to delete.

## Declaration

```swift
var subscriptionIDsToDelete: [CKSubscription.ID]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the IDs of the subscriptions that you want to delete. Its initial value is the array that you pass to the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKModifySubscriptionsOperation/init(subscriptionsToSave:subscriptionIDsToDelete:)] method. Modify this property as necessary before you execute the operation or submit it to a queue.

## Configuring the Modify Subscriptions Operation

- **subscriptionsToSave**: The subscriptions to save to the database.
